Title: Application Lead
Description:
— Project Role : Application LeadProject Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Must have skills : SAP FI S/4HANA AccountingGood to have skills : NAMinimum 3 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : 15 years full time educationSummary: 
As an Application Lead, you will lead the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. You will be responsible for ensuring the successful implementation of SAP FI S/4HANA Accounting and providing technical expertise to the team. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, analyzing business requirements, designing solutions, and overseeing the application development process.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Lead the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze business requirements.
- Design and develop solutions that meet the business needs and align with best practices.
- Provide technical expertise and guidance to the team members.
- Ensure the successful implementation of SAP FI S/4HANA Accounting.
- Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards.
- Troubleshoot and resolve application issues and defects.
- Contribute to the continuous improvement of application development processes.
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and advancements in SAP FI S/4HANA Accounting.
- Assist in the training and mentoring of junior team members.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in SAP FI S/4HANA Accounting.
- Strong understanding of financial accounting principles and processes.
- Experience in configuring and customizing SAP FI modules.
- Knowledge of integration points between SAP FI and other modules.
- Experience with SAP implementation methodologies and tools.
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with SAP S/4HANA Finance.
- Experience in leading application development projects.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in SAP FI S/4HANA Accounting.
- This position is based at our Chennai office.
- A 15 years full-time education is required.

- This position is based at our Bengaluru office.
- A BTech or MTech or MCA with IT or CSE or EEE or ECE is required.

Title: Software Development Lead

Your typical day will involve applying your knowledge of technologies, applications, methodologies, processes, and tools to support a client, project, or entity in Hyderabad.

a) Lead the development and configuration of software systems using Oracle Financials Cloud.
b) Apply your knowledge of technologies, applications, methodologies, processes, and tools to support a client, project, or entity.
c) Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful delivery of software systems.
d) Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members to ensure high-quality deliverables.
e) Stay updated with the latest advancements in Oracle Financials Cloud and related technologies to integrate innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage.

b) Good To Have Skills: Knowledge of related technologies such as Oracle E-Business Suite, Oracle Fusion Middleware, and Oracle Database.
c) Strong understanding of software development methodologies and processes.
d) Experience in leading software development teams.
e) Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
f) The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background with CA / CWA / MCom.

Title: Quality Engineer (Tester)
Description:
— Project Role : Quality Engineer (Tester)Project Role Description : Enables full stack solutions through multi-disciplinary team planning and ecosystem integration to accelerate delivery and drive quality across the application lifecycle. Performs continuous testing for security, API, and regression suite. Creates automation strategy, automated scripts and supports data and environment configuration. Participates in code reviews, monitors, and reports defects to support continuous improvement activities for the end-to-end testing process.                                                 Must have skills : Service DeliveryGood to have skills : NAMinimum 12 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : 15 years full time educationSummary: 
As a Full Stack Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and/or engineering the end-to-end features of a system, from user experience to backend code. Your typical day will involve using your development skills to deliver innovative solutions that help our clients improve the services they provide. You will leverage new technologies with a cloud-first and agile mindset to solve challenging business problems.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Expected to perform independently and become an SME.
- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions.
- Contribute in providing solutions to work-related problems.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement software solutions.
- Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code.
- Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to coding standards.
- Troubleshoot and debug issues in the software applications.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
- Assist in the deployment and maintenance of software applications.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Java Enterprise Edition.
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Spring Framework and Hibernate.
- Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles.
- Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Knowledge of relational databases and SQL.
- Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
- Experience with Agile development methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Java Enterprise Edition.
- This position is based at our Mumbai office.
- A 15 years full-time education is required.

Title: Full Stack Engineer
Description:
— Project Role : Full Stack EngineerProject Role Description : Responsible for developing and/or engineering the end-to-end features of a system, from user experience to backend code. Use development skills to deliver innovative solutions that help our clients improve the services they provide. Leverage new technologies that can be applied to solve challenging business problems with a cloud first and agile mindset.                                                                                                                                                                          Must have skills : Python (Programming Language)Good to have skills : NAMinimum 3 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : 15 yearsSummary: 
As a Full Stack Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and engineering end-to-end features of a system using Python programming language. Your typical day will involve working on user experience and backend code, delivering innovative solutions to improve client services with a cloud-first and agile mindset.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Design and develop scalable and maintainable web applications using Python programming language.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve complex business problems with innovative solutions.
- Develop and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices using Python frameworks such as Flask and Django.
- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code that adheres to industry standards and best practices.
- Implement automated testing and continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) pipelines to ensure high-quality code delivery.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Python programming language.
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Flask and Django frameworks, RESTful APIs, and microservices.
- Strong understanding of software development principles, including object-oriented programming, design patterns, and data structures.
- Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Experience with database technologies such as SQL and NoSQL.
- Solid grasp of software testing and deployment methodologies, including automated testing and CI/CD pipelines.
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Python programming language.
- The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions.
- This position is based at our Bengaluru office.

Title: Software Development Engineer
Description:
— Project Role : Software Development EngineerProject Role Description : Analyze, design, code and test multiple components of application code across one or more clients. Perform maintenance, enhancements and/or development work.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Must have skills : Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) PlusGood to have skills : Oracle Business Intelligence (BI) Publisher, Oracle HCM Cloud BI Reporting and AnalyticsMinimum 3 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : Minimum 15 years of fulltime qualificationSummary: 
As a Software Development Engineer, you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, coding, and testing multiple components of application code using Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) Plus. Your typical day will involve working with OBIEE Plus, performing maintenance, enhancements, and/or development work across one or more clients.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Design, develop, and maintain OBIEE Plus reports, dashboards, and analyses.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze business requirements, translating them into technical specifications.
- Perform maintenance, enhancements, and/or development work on OBIEE Plus components across one or more clients.
- Conduct unit testing and integration testing of OBIEE Plus components, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
- Provide technical support and troubleshooting for OBIEE Plus components, working closely with clients to resolve issues.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Strong experience in Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) Plus.
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Oracle BI Publisher, Oracle HCM Cloud BI Reporting and Analytics.
- Solid understanding of data warehousing concepts and ETL processes.
- Experience with SQL and PL/SQL programming languages.
- Familiarity with Oracle databases and related technologies.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) Plus.
- The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions.
- This position is based at our Pune office.

Title: Database Administrator
Description:
— Project Role : Database AdministratorProject Role Description : Administer, develop, test, or demonstrate databases. Perform many related database functions across one or more teams or clients, including designing, implementing and maintaining new databases, backup/recovery and configuration management. Install database management systems (DBMS) and provide input for modification of procedures and documentation used for problem resolution and day-to-day maintenance.                                                                                                                       Must have skills : Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)Good to have skills : NAMinimum 7.5 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : 15 years full time educationSummary: 
As a Database Administrator, you will administer, develop, test, or demonstrate databases. You will perform many related database functions across one or more teams or clients, including designing, implementing and maintaining new databases, backup/recovery and configuration management. Your typical day will involve installing database management systems (DBMS) and providing input for modification of procedures and documentation used for problem resolution and day-to-day maintenance. You will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth functioning of databases and contribute to the success of the organization.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Expected to be an SME
- Collaborate and manage the team to perform
- Responsible for team decisions
- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions
- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams
- Ensure data integrity and security in databases
- Perform regular database backups and recovery
- Monitor database performance and optimize as needed
- Design and implement database structures and schemas
- Troubleshoot and resolve database issues
- Develop and maintain database documentation
- Train and mentor junior database administrators
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)
- Experience with database administration and management
- Strong understanding of SQL and PL/SQL
- Knowledge of database security and performance optimization
- Experience with backup and recovery procedures
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Oracle Database
- Familiarity with cloud-based database platforms
- Experience with data migration and integration
- Knowledge of database design principles
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)
- This position is based at our Bengaluru office
- A 15 years full time education is required

Title: Software Development Lead
Description:
— Project Role : Software Development LeadProject Role Description : Develop and configure software systems either end-to-end or for a specific stage of product lifecycle. Apply knowledge of technologies, applications, methodologies, processes and tools to support a client, project or entity.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Must have skills : Oracle Cloud FinancialsGood to have skills : NAMinimum 5 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : Must have 15 years of regular education with CA or CWA or MCom and relevant certifications in Oracle Financial Cloud Functional  Summary: 
As an Oracle Financials Cloud Software Development Lead, you will be responsible for developing and configuring software systems using your expertise in Oracle Financials Cloud. Your typical day will involve applying your knowledge of technologies, applications, methodologies, processes, and tools to support a client, project, or entity in Hyderabad.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
a) Lead the development and configuration of software systems using Oracle Financials Cloud.
b) Apply your knowledge of technologies, applications, methodologies, processes, and tools to support a client, project, or entity.
c) Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful delivery of software systems.
d) Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members to ensure high-quality deliverables.
e) Stay updated with the latest advancements in Oracle Financials Cloud and related technologies to integrate innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
a) Must To Have Skills: Expertise in Oracle Financials Cloud.
b) Good To Have Skills: Knowledge of related technologies such as Oracle E-Business Suite, Oracle Fusion Middleware, and Oracle Database.
c) Strong understanding of software development methodologies and processes.
d) Experience in leading software development teams.
e) Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
f) The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background with CA / CWA / MCom.

Title: Software Development Engineer
Description:
— Project Role : Software Development EngineerProject Role Description : Analyze, design, code and test multiple components of application code across one or more clients. Perform maintenance, enhancements and/or development work.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Must have skills : Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) PlusGood to have skills : Oracle Business Intelligence (BI) Publisher, Oracle HCM Cloud BI Reporting and AnalyticsMinimum 3 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : Minimum 15 years of fulltime qualificationSummary: 
As a Software Development Engineer, you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, coding, and testing multiple components of application code using Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) Plus. Your typical day will involve working with OBIEE Plus, performing maintenance, enhancements, and/or development work across one or more clients.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Design, develop, and maintain OBIEE Plus reports, dashboards, and analyses.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze business requirements, translating them into technical specifications.
- Perform maintenance, enhancements, and/or development work on OBIEE Plus components across one or more clients.
- Conduct unit testing and integration testing of OBIEE Plus components, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
- Provide technical support and troubleshooting for OBIEE Plus components, working closely with clients to resolve issues.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Strong experience in Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) Plus.
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Oracle BI Publisher, Oracle HCM Cloud BI Reporting and Analytics.
- Solid understanding of data warehousing concepts and ETL processes.
- Experience with SQL and PL/SQL programming languages.
- Familiarity with Oracle databases and related technologies.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) Plus.
- The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions.
- This position is based at our Pune office.

Title: Database Administrator
Description:
— Project Role : Database AdministratorProject Role Description : Administer, develop, test, or demonstrate databases. Perform many related database functions across one or more teams or clients, including designing, implementing and maintaining new databases, backup/recovery and configuration management. Install database management systems (DBMS) and provide input for modification of procedures and documentation used for problem resolution and day-to-day maintenance.                                                                                                                       Must have skills : Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)Good to have skills : NAMinimum 7.5 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : 15 years full time educationSummary: 
As a Database Administrator, you will administer, develop, test, or demonstrate databases. You will perform many related database functions across one or more teams or clients, including designing, implementing and maintaining new databases, backup/recovery and configuration management. Your typical day will involve installing database management systems (DBMS) and providing input for modification of procedures and documentation used for problem resolution and day-to-day maintenance. You will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth functioning of databases and contribute to the success of the organization.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Expected to be an SME
- Collaborate and manage the team to perform
- Responsible for team decisions
- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions
- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams
- Ensure data integrity and security in databases
- Perform regular database backups and recovery
- Monitor database performance and optimize as needed
- Design and implement database structures and schemas
- Troubleshoot and resolve database issues
- Develop and maintain database documentation
- Train and mentor junior database administrators
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)
- Experience with database administration and management
- Strong understanding of SQL and PL/SQL
- Knowledge of database security and performance optimization
- Experience with backup and recovery procedures
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Oracle Database
- Familiarity with cloud-based database platforms
- Experience with data migration and integration
- Knowledge of database design principles
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)
- This position is based at our Bengaluru office
- A 15 years full time education is required

Title: Application Developer
Description:
— Project Role : Application DeveloperProject Role Description : Design, build and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Must have skills : SAP PP Production Planning & Control Discrete IndustriesGood to have skills : NAMinimum 7.5 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : 15 years full time educationSummary: 
As an Application Developer, you will design, build, and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements. You will be responsible for ensuring that the applications are aligned with the needs of the organization and contribute to its overall success. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, analyzing business requirements, designing and implementing solutions, and ensuring the applications are running smoothly.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Expected to be an SME, collaborate and manage the team to perform.
- Responsible for team decisions.
- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions.
- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements.
- Design and develop high-quality applications that meet business needs.
- Configure and customize applications to align with business processes.
- Perform unit testing and debugging to ensure application functionality.
- Conduct code reviews and provide feedback to improve code quality.
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.
- Assist in troubleshooting and resolving application issues.
- Document application design, development, and maintenance processes.
- Train end-users on how to effectively use the applications.
- Ensure compliance with coding standards and best practices.
- Identify and implement process improvements to enhance application performance and efficiency.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in SAP PP Production Planning & Control Discrete Industries.
- Experience with SAP PP modules and their integration with other SAP modules.
- Strong understanding of manufacturing processes and production planning concepts.
- Knowledge of SAP PP master data, BOMs, work centers, and routing.
- Experience in configuring and customizing SAP PP functionalities.
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with SAP S/4HANA and SAP Activate methodology.
- Experience in SAP PP implementation projects.
- Knowledge of SAP PP integration with other modules like MM, SD, and QM.
- Familiarity with SAP PP reporting and analytics tools.
- Understanding of SAP PP best practices and industry standards.
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in SAP PP Production Planning & Control Discrete Industries.
- This position is based at our Hyderabad office.
- A 15 years full-time education is required.

Title: Application Lead
Description:
— Project Role : Application LeadProject Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Must have skills : SAP PP Production Planning & Control Discrete IndustriesGood to have skills : NAMinimum 2 year(s) of experience is requiredEducational Qualification : 15 years full time educationSummary: 
As an Application Lead, you will lead the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. You will be responsible for ensuring the successful implementation of applications and providing technical guidance to the team. Your typical day will involve collaborating with stakeholders, analyzing requirements, designing solutions, and overseeing the development process. You will also be involved in troubleshooting and resolving any issues that arise during the application lifecycle, ensuring smooth operations and customer satisfaction.
 
Roles & Responsibilities: 
- Expected to perform independently and become an SME.
- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions.
- Contribute in providing solutions to work-related problems.
- Lead the design, development, and implementation of applications.
- Act as the primary point of contact for application-related queries and issues.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements.
- Design and architect solutions that meet business needs and align with best practices.
- Provide technical guidance and mentorship to the development team.
- Oversee the development process, ensuring adherence to coding standards and quality guidelines.
- Troubleshoot and resolve any issues that arise during the application lifecycle.
- Ensure smooth operations and customer satisfaction.
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.
- Identify opportunities for process improvement and optimization.
- Conduct regular code reviews to ensure code quality and maintainability.
 
Professional & Technical Skills: 
- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in SAP PP Production Planning & Control Discrete Industries.
- Strong understanding of software development lifecycle and methodologies.
- Experience in leading application design and development projects.
- Knowledge of SAP modules and integration with other systems.
- Hands-on experience in configuring and customizing SAP PP module.
- Experience in data migration and system integration.
- Good To Have Skills: Experience with SAP S/4HANA and Fiori applications.
- Experience in working with Agile methodologies.
- Knowledge of SAP best practices and industry standards.
 
Additional Information: 
- The candidate should have a minimum of 2 years of experience in SAP PP Production Planning & Control Discrete Industries.
- This position is based at our Bengaluru office.
- A 15 years full-time education is required.
